pages.text: Somebody foul seems to be around, because my $(k)emeralds$() have gone missing. I've made a new, sturdy contraption to keep it safe. I'd like to see them get through $(o)$(l)this.
... they got through it. They've also started stealing my food. This time I'll set the combination more thoughtfully. Perhaps I should lock it with something rarer.

pages.title: Secret Buttons
pages.text: While I'm at it, I should pobably hide it behind a secret entrance... Something $(o)really$() subtle.

The stealing has become more rampant and less subtle, and yet I've seen no sign of $(o)them$()... Since I hid and replaced the lock on my vault, they haven't touched it, but the nearby village has been destroyed. I've tried $(l:multiplayer/communication#sending_mail)writing to my friends$(/l) but have gotten no response in a while. They all settled so far away. $(br2)I don't know what to do.
My shelter got destroyed. $(br2)I don't even have my $(l:multiplayer/memories)photographs$(/l) anymore. $(br2)I need to equip myself with $(l:magic/enchanting)something more enhanced...$(/l)
